meanings.sent1: The fasters at the event were dedicated to their cause.
meanings.sent2: She joined the group of fasters for a day of fasting and prayer.
meanings.sent3: The fasters decided to have a fasting competition to see who could go the longest without food.
meanings.sent4: The fasters in the community were like beacons of self-discipline and willpower.
meanings.sent5: The fasters' commitment to fasting inspired others to join them in their practice.

meanings.sent1: She was the faster runner among her friends.
meanings.sent2: The car was faster than the bicycle on the road.
meanings.sent3: The faster route to the park was through the shortcut.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move faster during the exciting game.
meanings.sent5: The faster pace of the music made everyone dance with more energy.

meanings.definition: Third person singular form of fast.
meanings.sent1: He fasters every Monday for religious reasons.
meanings.sent2: The cheetah fasters to catch its prey in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit fasters when it senses danger nearby.
meanings.sent4: The river fasters through the narrow canyon, creating a beautiful waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The wind fasters through the trees, creating a soothing sound.
